description: Discover how to make a delicious breakfast granola from scratch with this tasty recipe, which can easily be customised to suit all tastes.
keywords: Granola,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Quick & easy breakfast,Egg free,Spring,Sesame free,High protein,High fibre,Sep 2020,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian
name: Easy Granola Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180°C/160°C fan-forced. Line a baking tray with baking paper.

Place honey, butter, vanilla and 1/4 cup water in a bowl, mixing to combine. Place oats, coconut, almonds, pepitas and cinnamon in another large bowl, then stir through honey mixture until well combined.
Spread mixture onto tray and bake for 10 minutes. Stir and break up into small clusters, then bake for a further 8 minutes or until golden. Cool completely on tray. Serve.
